channel.title: I need a shop coder
channel.description:
I have tried coding shops throughout many different programs, tutorial, and such. Nothing works. I need a good shop coder for my server- PK Tribe. You will get admin. I already have the npc's i want and the shops items written on paper. So i will just tell you what to add. PLEASE...
---My servers logo:[img]http://i8.tinypic.com/6cdjpte.png[/img]
